sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FaBars } from 'react-icons/fa' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { MenuData, AuthMenuData } from './SidebarData' import { Navbar, Hamburger, NavMenu, NavMenuItems, NavMenuItem, StyledBrand } from './pages/css/navbar' function NavBar (props) { const isAuth = props.isAuth const [sidebar, setSidebar] = useState(false) const showSidebar = () => setSidebar(!sidebar) const data = isAuth ? AuthMenuData : MenuData return ( Wealthy app {data.map((item, index) => { return {item.title} })} ) } export default NavBar
